page.title: 04INDUSTRY COBRIDGE ENGINEERS
page.content: When we were taken to Pillar Engineering,we were taken around and given lots of interesting information.. We asked a lot of questions.We were told that the company made 300,000 pounds a year,the youngest worker was 18years old,and near to the Potters Holiday was the busiest time of the year.They have engineering stores all over the U.K.,and they are all in different named areas,for instance the one we visited is in the Midlands area. The head office is in Leicester.They sell day today engineering requirements like tools,spades,clothes etc.You do not need any O Levels to work there you just have to be careful and you must know what you are doing.A worker gets the average wage of about sixty pounds a week.There are 15 staff and they are getting a computer to help them.
